Hi Deb,
 
In my opinion and from answers to questions that I have asked
an=
d research I have done, including speaking to my father and gradmother
whic=
h I have files for. I have been told that the communication I am recieving =
is that of spirits of human beings
that have passed. ther very well could b=
e communication from other entities that I have not gotten any conformation=
 on.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: lisby@earth=
link.netDate: Mon, 14 Jan 2008 22:04:53 -0500Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Que=
stion ..




Probably both and then some, Debbie. I'm open to all possibili=
ties. 

Ann :)




On Jan 14, 2008, at 9:43 PM, misujoey wrote:




Hi Ann =
and Bruce .. Thanks for taking the time to answer .. One more question .. D=
o you believe you are speaking to Heaven, Aliens, or both?? Lol ..--- In EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:>=
> > Hi Debbie,> > My experience is that it may or may not be the same entit=
ies.> > I know that does not answer your question, let me explain.> If you =
are an established researcher with an assigned technician> most likely it w=
ill predominantly be the same spirit that is communicating.> > There will a=
lso be other spirits that will come through with their individual messages =
of course> but your tech/guide will dominate the communication.> > There ar=
e a couple of reasons you would get different sounding spirit communication=
> the first being that at all different times of the day different radio st=
ations are broadcasting> a myriad of different sounds. The entities trying =
to communicate will use whatever fragments > of sound they need to form the=
 message and the sound signal changes from second to second.> > Thus the di=
fferent sounding voices. The second reason is each different box will produ=
ce it's own unique> sound such as the minibox as apposed to the super radio=
 each produce a distinctive sound.> > Lastly, if you are new to box researc=
h you may not have a permanent tech/guide assigned yet and who ever is avai=
lable> at the time of your session will take control of that session. I fin=
d that your tech does not bother to seek out recognisable > noise fragments=
 to form his or her message until you have developed a working relationship=
 as well as a personal one with them.> > There is no exact explanation for =
any of this, it is all conjecture by the individual researcher but I try to=
 answer any questions based on my experience.> > I hope this answer helps. =
Please feel free to ask any thing at any time and I'll do my best to help.>=
 > Bruce> Bruce Halliday > > > To: EVP-ITC@...: misujoey@...: Mon, 14 Jan 2=
008 23:51:04 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Question ..> > > > > Does anyone find =
that each "Box" has a different group of people speaking and helping?I've s=
wept "Manually", used the "MiniBox" and the "SuperBox" and there seems to b=
e a different set of people on each device. Thanks,Debbie > > > > > > > ___=
